bottle.name: 2015 Trilus California Chardonnay
bottle.short_tasting_note: An exuberantly fruited Chardonnay, with flavors of lemon curd, apple and pear displayed on the palate.
bottle.tasting_note: An exuberantly fruited Chardonnay, with flavors of lemon curd, apple and pear prominently displayed on the palate. A richer mouth-feel can be attributed to partial barrel-fermentation and sur-lie ageing, however the wine remains focused and vibrant due to limited ML.
